TopicTitle: Retrieve all debris without clicking and clicking and clicking?

Articles.Content: I have a lot of debris scattered around Kerbin. I could really do with the money from all those parts. Is there some way to recover it all without having to click on each goddamn piece and then confirm in the Tracking Station?

Not as far as I know.

You can delete all the debris by temporarily setting the 'persistent debris' slider to 0, but this will only delete it, not recover it for funds.
I think someone built a mod for this, but I can't recall the name off hand (or if it's even current for 0.25, let alone 0.90).

I think someone built a mod for this, but I can't recall the name off hand (or if it's even current for 0.25, let alone 0.90).

There is a couple of mods (DebRefund and Recover your Stages, IIRC) that allow you to recover funds from stages that were dropped during ascent. But they're cannot recover debris that is currently on orbit. You need to land them manually and then recover (use KAS to add parachutes and Klaw-equipped tug to deorbit them).
I've been asking for a "recover all debris" and "abandon all debris" button for over a year. No reason to not have it in stock.

There is a couple of mods (DebRefund and Recover your Stages, IIRC)

It sounds like THX1138 is looking to recover parts that are landed on Kerbin. Do you know off hand if these work for parts that are already landed?

Cheers,

~Claw

It sounds like THX1138 is looking to recover parts that are landed on Kerbin. Do you know off hand if these work for parts that are already landed?

Cheers,

~Claw

No, looks like these works only for stages that were dropped during ascent. He has two options - either do it manually or ask for a small plugin with such functionality.

I've been asking for a "recover all debris" and "abandon all debris" button for over a year. No reason to not have it in stock.

Well, you can abandon all debris by just turning persistent debris to 0 in option.
